name: Halloween Hunt (OnoGames)
description:
It should take you around  8- 10 minutes to complete. You can change the settings in the menu

Note: The Game is was made in 3 days as a GameJam for Halloween

Controls

WASD to move, 

Escape to pause menu

  Mouse to look, 

F to use the flashlight

 E to use interact,

Shift to Run

Requirements:

Mode: Single player video game

Genres: Horror,Survival

Platforms: Microsoft Windows

Studio: OnoGames

Developer: Yves Weinhardt

Music: Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio

Requirements:

Minimum:

Ram: 6GB

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / Radeon RX 580

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo

Recommended:

Ram: 8GB

GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580

Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad
